lines.text: It's okay to be scared Cayce... you should be...
The girl is certain she is going to die. She's praying. In her mind she's praying.
I wouldn't have hurt you for anything! Now I'm going to hurt you worst of all...
You have to stop the Goddamned plane, somebody is about to be killed!
Let me off this plane NOW or I will scream like this ALL THE WAY TO NEW YORK!

[calm, focused]
You knew we were following you tonight... not because you could read my thoughts... but because you could read Jack's... Well, Jack ain't here any more...

[watching through the minds of the shadow man]
In the fridge there's left over pizza and a cup... some kind of kid's cup...
In the living room there toys scattered over the floor... there's a baseball in one of those display thing's on the coffee table...

[scared cutting her off]
Can you see a TV?
With a trophy... a football trophy?

[in full realization]
He's in my house... the son of a bitch is in my house. The kids will be home any minute.

[after Casey sees him kill a woman]
She was wonderful, Casey... and so were you.
[writes fear in blood on the wall]
